maitrix-org/llm-reasoners

tools for building and evaluating advanced LLM reasoning algorithms

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Step-by-step code for adding reasoning to a pre-trained LLM, with hands-on examples and explanations
  • Hierarchical LLM reasoning with thought templates
  • Framework for building AI agent tools for Deepseek Reasoner
  • semantic reasoning engine for LLMs, fixes RAG drift, boosts AI logic
  • Platform for automatic algorithm design using LLMs
  • lets you plug structured knowledge bases into LLMs for efficient, scalable augmentation
  • math reasoning model using agentic RL, efficient tool use, strong benchmark results
  • Open-source toolkit for building scalable LLM inference infrastructure
  • Orchestrates multiple language models for collaborative problem solving and consensus
